nextcloudinstitutions_file_added: ${user} added file ${path} to Nextcloud (for Institutions) in ${node}
nextcloudinstitutions_file_updated: ${user} updated file ${path} in Nextcloud (for Institutions) in ${node}
nextcloudinstitutions_folder_created: ${user} created folder ${path} in Nextcloud (for Institutions) in ${node}
nextcloudinstitutions_node_authorized: ${user} authorized the Nextcloud (for Institutions) addon for ${node}
nextcloudinstitutions_node_deauthorized: ${user} deauthorized the Nextcloud (for Institutions) addon for ${node}
